document.full_text: wba light-welterweight champion amir khan will take on ibf holder zab judah in a unification fight in las vegas on july 23, the briton said on his twitter page.
document.title: briton khan to fight judah in unification clash
lines_and_colors: wba light-welterweight champion amir khan will take on ibf holder zab judah in a unification fight in las vegas on july 23, the briton said on his twitter page.
